alert.note: Alert for Bear Lake Valley; Franklin, Eastern Oneida Region; Raft River Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 20 at 5:59AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: For the Raft River region expect 1 to 3 inches of snow in general. The Sublette mtns expect 3 to 5 inches. Winds will be breezy near Idahome with gusts near 40 mph. Sweetzer summit will get around 2 inches of snow. For the Franklin/Eastern Oneida region expect 1 to 5 inches of snow. The Holbrook mtns look to get around 3 inches. Malad pass around 2.5 inches of snow. Weston, Oxford, and Elkhorn peaks look to get around 4 inches of snow. These peaks will see winds of around 20 mph with higher gusts. For the Bear Lake area, including Georgetown summit and Geneva Summit, expect 1 to 4 inches of snow. Bern looks to get around 2.5 with Montpelier receiving around 2 inches. This Bear Lake area could get slightly more snow than 1 to 4 inches. Currently, the models show the Wasatch mtns getting the better snow and this Bear Lake area being shadowed or downsloped. Overall, expect winds less than 15 mph.

area.areaDesc: Bear Lake Valley; Franklin, Eastern Oneida Region; Raft River Region
